soen6441.team01.warzone.model

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • soen6441.team01.warzone.model.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMapModel

    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMapModel
    Manages Warzone Maps. Maps are basically composed of continents, countries and the links (ie neighbors) between countries.

      • mapTraversal

        public static void mapTraversal(ICountryModel p_country,
                                java.util.ArrayList<ICountryModel> p_visited_countries)
        implementation of DFS algorithm to traverse all nodes of the graph
        Parameters:
        p_country - the starting point for traverse
        p_visited_countries - the list of countries visited through the search

      • mapContinentTraversal

        public static void mapContinentTraversal(IContinentModel p_continent,
                                         ICountryModel p_country,
                                         java.util.ArrayList<ICountryModel> p_visited_countries)
        implements a DFS algorithm to traverse all the countries of a continent
        Parameters:
        p_continent - the desired continent
        p_country - the start point country
        p_visited_countries - list of all countries visited

      • loadMap

        public static IMapModel loadMap(java.util.List<java.lang.String> p_records,
                                ModelFactory p_factory_model)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads a Warzone map from an array containing records defined by "domination" style map file. The following link describes the format of the "domination" map file : http://domination.sourceforge.net/makemaps.shtml.
        Parameters:
        p_records - a list of map records
        p_factory_model - the required factory model
        Returns:
        instance of new Map model
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - error parsing the contents of the map file

      • refreshCountriesOfAllContinents

        public static void refreshCountriesOfAllContinents(IMapModel p_map_model)
        ask the continent objects to build their list of countries
        Parameters:
        p_map_model - the map model containing the continents to refresh

      • loadMapFromFile

        public static IMapModel loadMapFromFile(java.lang.String p_map_filename,
                                        ModelFactory p_factory_model)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads a Warzone map from an existing "domination" style map file. The following link describes the format of the "domination" map file : http://domination.sourceforge.net/makemaps.shtml.
        Parameters:
        p_map_filename - the filename of the map file
        p_factory_model - the model factory to use when needed
        Returns:
        instance of new Map model
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - error parsing the contents of the map file

      • processLoadMapCommand

        public static IMapModel processLoadMapCommand(java.lang.String p_loadmap_params,
                                              ModelFactory p_factory_model)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        parse the loapmap command.

        Syntax: loapmap filename

        Parameters:
        p_loadmap_params - the loapmap parameters (just the parameters without the loapmap command itself)
        p_factory_model - the model factory to use when needed
        Returns:
        map model based on the supplied map file filename.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - any problem parsing or creating the new map

      • editmap

        public static IMapModel editmap(java.lang.String p_filename,
                                ModelFactory p_factory_model)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Load a map from an existing "domination" map file, or create a new map from scratch if the file does not exist.
        Parameters:
        p_filename - map file name
        p_factory_model - the model factory to use when needed
        Returns:
        the loaded or created map model
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - when it is not possible to cast string to integer
        java.lang.Exception - when there is an exception

      • deepCloneMap

        public static IMapModel deepCloneMap(IMapModel p_src_map,
                                     ModelFactory p_cloned_factory_model)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new isolated map that contains a copy of all counties and continents.
        Parameters:
        p_src_map - the source map to copy from
        p_cloned_factory_model - the factory model to base the copy on (modifies respective references)
        Returns:
        newly created isolated copy of the map
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - unexpected error

      • getMapAsDominationMapFormat

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getMapAsDominationMapFormat()
        Convert the current map into the "domination" game map format. Note that this implementation of Warzone does not process the continent color which is part of the domination map file format.
        Returns:
        the current map in the domination game style map file. Each string of the array is a line in the map file.

      • saveMap

        public void saveMap(java.lang.String p_filename)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Save a map to a text file exactly as edited (using the "domination" game map format). Note that the map is validated before it is saved, and a warning is issued to the user if it's invalid; however the map is still saved if it's invalid to give the user a chance to reload it and finish editing it at a later time.
        Specified by:
        saveMap in interface IMapModel
        Parameters:
        p_filename - the filaname of the map file
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - unexpected error
